professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with several years of IT and customer service experience, skilled in database management, optimization, and trouble-shooting, committed to achieving customer satisfaction and meeting expectations.

key_responsibilities: Administered and optimized databases for performance and accuracy.
Monitored and resolved database issues to ensure smooth operations.
Collaborated with IT teams to implement new systems and procedures.
Managed databases for various applications and tools.
Developed and maintained data integrity and security protocols.
Provided training and documentation for database users.
Assisted with database design and implementation.
Performed data backups and recovery procedures.
Supported users with database queries and troubleshooting.

technical_skills:
Database Administration",
            "Database Optimization",
            "SQL Queries",
            "Data Integrity Management",
            "Trouble-Shooting
tools_and_software:
Microsoft SQL Server",
            "Windows Server",
            "MySQL",
            "Microsoft Office Suite",
            "Crystal Reports",
            "Visio",
            "Adobe Acrobat",
            "Quality Assurance Testing Tools
